definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
rampart/base (in baseball)/to build with stones, bricks etc

sentences.english: Hitoshi hit a four-bagger down here at the park last night.
sentences.chinese: 仁志昨晚在公园里打出了一个本垒打。

sentences.english: He hopes Pfizer can develop those home-run drugs.
sentences.chinese: 他希望辉瑞能研发出成功的抗癌药物，打出本垒打。

sentences.english: The runner tried to get to the base, but it was too late.
sentences.chinese: 跑垒员试图想跑回本垒，但已经太迟了。

sentences.english: Five Yankees had run-scoring hits in the frame.
sentences.chinese: 共有五位洋基球员在他的投球下回到本垒。

sentences.english: That hasn’t exactly led to a home run.
sentences.chinese: 确切地说，这并没有带来一个本垒打。

sentences.english: If thrown right, a curveball drops right before it gets to home plate.
sentences.chinese: 假如投得正确，曲球会正巧在抵达本垒前坠下。

sentences.english: Barry Bonds broke the record for career home runs.
sentences.chinese: 邦兹破纪录的职业生涯本垒打。

sentences.english: You hit too many homers and people start puffing you up.
sentences.chinese: 你打中了太多的本垒，于是人们开始把你捧上了天。

sentences.english: A White, Black, & an Ash Yellow homers.
sentences.chinese: 阿白，黑，灰及黄河的一个本垒打。

sentences.english: You have to be very quick to get an infield homer.
sentences.chinese: 必须要跑得很快才能打一个内场本垒打。

sentences.english: Paul batted three runs and toped off the game with a home run.
sentences.chinese: 保罗击出一记三垒打，跑回本垒。

sentences.english: call balls and strikes behind the plate.
sentences.chinese: 在本垒板后判为好球或坏球。

sentences.english: But then suddenly he stopped hitting home runs.
sentences.chinese: 但是他突然中止了打出本垒打的表现。

definition: ten-pin bowling/bowling ball/(baseball etc) ground ball
to serve the ball/to tee off
